ygData.subject: Hiya! (was: RE: RE: Whats your record? plus Velious bar d armor t hread)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Atonal! I wondered what happened to you! I have been on this list for at least a year, but I try not to bore folks unless I have something to contribute.
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, Atonal! I wondered what happened to you! I have been on this list for at
least a year, but I try not to bore folks unless I have something to
contribute. There's a couple bards from Xegony here: Slyde and Darkfoxx come
to mind first, but I apologize to the others I can't call to mind instantly.
Evercrack is a disease, we were moving and not playing for abouut a month
and we were itching to get back. I may never finish getting rooms painted
with Velious out!

Speaking of Velious, we went last night, visited or toured about 7 zones
total. Reminded me why I love being a bard! Outdoor exploration! We were
grouped but outdoors ended up going off in different directions, so I made
the fast runs around the zones walls to look for connections to other zones.
We'd already been to the Coldain city and found mostly lots of folks wanting
a rez. Our cleric was longsuffering but rez'ing everyone that asked. We only
killed things that attacked us first since faction is unknown and that was
all mostly green stuff. I bought the 34th song from the gnome pirate camp, I
only saw it and no other songs for sale there, along with all the other
class spells. So far, I like the new interface options, the higher
resolution options, and my machine wasn't as bogged as I feared it would be
(400 Celeron).

If you haven't already, check the Concert Hall boards, a new lute was found
that gives Illusion Howler.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
